items.title: Govee’s Bluetooth hygrometer can track temperature trends for up to 2 years, now $11
items.summary:
Govee Bluetooth Digital Hygrometer

Buy for $11 (Reg. $13)

What we love

I have six different temperature sensors spread throughout my home so I can accurately tweak vents and keep things feeling the same throughout my home. Sure, it’s easy to feel when there’s a major issue, but even then, it’s hard to tell how much progress you’re making and a hygrometer like this can help. I like that it can be paired with the Govee app and provide up to 2 years of historical temperature data.

The new flagship tablets are now available for purchase straight from Samsung with some notable trade-in discounts that can knock up to $800 off the price of the new tablets alongside as much as $150 in FREE storage upgrades. items.title: Lisbon funicular crash exposes safety flaws in city's old charm
items.summary: LISBON (Reuters) -The death of at least 16 people in an historic cable car that derailed in Lisbon has exposed flaws in the "old charm" image of the Portuguese capital, which is brimming with tourists but runs on quaint but creaking infrastructure. Read full story

items.title: Hunger grows in Nigeria as aid cuts reduce food supplies
items.summary: DIKWA, Nigeria (Reuters) -Destitute families displaced by conflict in northeastern Nigeria are finding nutrition centres closed or running low on food as a result of a collapse in aid funding from the United States and other Western countries. Read full story

GoPro has begun teasing its upcoming MAX 2 360 action cam, suggesting it could arrive sooner rather than later. But while that’s still on the horizon, you might want to jump in and snag the 2025 refreshed model of the original GoPro MAX at $249 shipped. Regularly $350, this updated model first dropped to $249 back in July before climbing back up to its full price. Today’s deal marks the return of that all-time low with a $120 discount, making this a great time to cash in if you missed out on the previous offer and don’t want to pay the full price for the new unit that’ll likely debut in the coming months. items.title: This new Baseus wall charger debuts with a detachable 10K Qi2 MagSafe power bank for on-the-go charging
items.summary:
Baseus is stepping into the spotlight at IFA alongside Anker, UGREEN, and Aukey with a new charger called the EnerGeek GT01. This clever solution pairs a 10,000mAh MagSafe power bank with a wall adapter that sports foldable prongs. The two snap together for a compact all-in-one unit, or you can detach the battery for portable charging while leaving a 27W USB-C adapter plugged into the outlet for your other devices. It’s one of the most versatile charging units out there, and it has plenty of other neat features which you can learn more about below.

items.title: EcoFlow is providing a 57% discount on its DELTA Pro 3,600Wh power station to new $1,597 low (Reg. up to $3,699)
items.summary:
EcoFlow is offering a special promotion for the best price yet on its DELTA Pro Portable Power Station at $1,597.06 shipped, after using the promo code EFAFD6 at checkout for an additional 6% off, which beats out the current Amazon pricing by $202. This model carries along a $3,699 MSRP, though we usually see it starting around $2,799 over at Amazon, with discounts having taken things as low as $1,694 there, while some direct sales from the brand have dropped things as low as $1,614 thanks to extra savings codes. While this promotion lasts through September 21, you’ll be getting a 57% markdown off the MSRP that saves you a grand total of $2,102 off that same high rate and lands it at a new all-time low price.

items.title: Exclusive: Nomad’s gorgeous metal/glass MagSafe Stand One Max charger gets rare 20% discount
items.summary:
There are some wonderful MagSafe charging stands out there, including a new batch of Qi2.2 25W models like the one Anker revealed this morning with an onboard display. But very few of them can stand alongside the latest 3-in-1 Nomad Stand One Max in terms of design prowess. It’s not the most affordable and it’s no longer the fastest, but it is still one of the most premium and prettiest-looking models on the market if you ask me. It’s also rarely ever on sale unless you have our exclusive 9to520 discount code in hand.

items.title: Tap into 25W Qi2.2 wireless charging speeds on the go with this 10K MagSafe power bank down at $70 low
items.summary:
Over at Amazon, you’ll find UGREEN’s official storefront offering Prime members its new 10,000mAh Qi2.2 MagFlow power bank for $69.99 shipped. This is the first time we’re tracking a deal on this brand-new model that hit the scene a couple of weeks back for $90. It’s now joining the fresh low on UGREEN’s 2-in-1 Qi2.2 MagSafe charging station at $50, letting you upgrade your charging setup with the latest models for less. Today’s $20 discount marks the best price we’ve tracked for this MagSafe battery pack, so be sure to snag it after getting more details below.

more…

items.title: Rad Power’s first fall sale provides extra batteries to new Radrunner cargo utility e-bikes starting from $1,499 + much more
items.summary:
Rad Power Bikes has launched its Fall Savings Sale through October 1, which is offering select discounts and a bunch of free extra battery bundles on new and legacy e-bikes. That’s not all, as you can also get a free Just-in-Case Kit ($316 value) with select models (all that is laid out below the fold) and discounted batteries for those already riding the brand’s e-bikes. Among the models getting a free extra battery for double the mileage is the new RadRunner Cargo Utility e-bike at $1,499 shipped and RadRunner Plus Cargo Utility e-bike at $1,799 shipped, which are both getting a free 10Ah Safe Shield Battery ($449 value) – just be sure to add both to your cart for the automatic discount to be applied. These new models hit the market back at the end of April and have only seen smaller bundle packages attached in past sales, with this not only being the first time we’re seeing extra batteries offered with your purchase, but these are the biggest bundles to be attached to date. Head below for more on these e-bikes and the other deals we see during this sale.
